Dialogue.Page: Crashes: 30 (It's fun hearing the brittle crust crack)
Woah. What are these weird lil' crystals? They're making me stick to the wall..
Are they playing with gravity somehow? Oh, wow.. This would be incredible for exploring, wouldn't it?
I gotta bring this home to Timber Hearth! If that's even.. possible.
Okay, pulling isn't working. I think if I pull any harder I'm gonna break it..
Guess you can't pull these out without breaking 'em once they're set? Good to know, I guess..
Alright, note to self, Feldspar: if you find any more of these not stuck to a wall, bring 'em home!
..Man, nothing in all these houses? Did the Nomai use them all up or something?
Guess I'll keep looking elsewhere. I ain't going home without one to put on exhibit in Hornfel's new museum!
